mapper.insert: insert into ev_board (ev_idx, ev_sellcvs, ev_subject, ev_content, ev_notice, ev_filename, id, nickname) values (ev_board_idx_seq.nextval, #{ev_sellcvs}, #{ev_subject}, #{ev_content}, #{ev_notice}, #{ev_filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id}, #{nickname})
mapper.update: update ev_board set ev_hit = ev_hit + 1 where ev_idx = #{ev_idx}
update ev_board set ev_sellcvs = #{ev_sellcvs} ,ev_subject = #{ev_subject}, ev_content = #{ev_content}, ev_notice = #{ev_notice} where ev_idx = #{ev_idx}
mapper.select: select * from ev_board where ev_notice = 'yes' order by ev_idx desc
select * from ev_board where extract (month from ev_date) = extract (month from sysdate) and extract (year from ev_date) = extract (year from sysdate)
mapper.insert: insert into schedule (syear, smonth, sday, eyear, emonth, eday, event, gup) values (#{sYear}, #{sMonth}, #{sDay}, #{eYear}, #{eMonth}, #{eDay}, #{event}, schedule_gup_seq.nextval)
mapper.update: update schedule set syear = #{sYear}, smonth = #{sMonth}, sday = #{sDay}, eyear = #{eYear}, emonth = #{eMonth}, eday = #{eDay}, event = #{event} where gup = #{gup}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ev_board where ev_sellcvs = #{category}

select.if: select count(*) from ev_board where ev_subject like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
select count(*) from ev_board where ev_sellcvs = #{category} and ev_subject like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'

mapper.insert: insert into ev_boardcomment (evc_idx, evc_gup, evc_content, id, nickname) values (ev_boardcomment_idx_seq.nextval, #{evc_gup}, #{evc_content}, #{id}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: select count(*) from ev_boardcomment where evc_gup = #{evc_idx}
select * from ev_boardcomment where evc_gup = #{evc_idx} order by evc_idx desc
mapper.update: update ev_boardcomment set evc_content = #{evc_content} where evc_idx = #{evc_idx}
